items.name: Goethite
items.description: A mineral containing mainly iron and trace amounts of zinc.
items.usageDescription: Can be smelted in a furnace to make iron bars. Yields iron as well as zinc when crushed.

items.name: Magnetite
items.description: A mineral commonly found magnetically aligned. Contains iron as well as silica.
items.usageDescription: Can be smelted in a furnace for iron bars. Crushing will result in iron and silica dust.

items.name: Pyratite
items.description: Coloqually known as "fool's gold", this mineral bears a slight yellow lustre.
items.usageDescription: Can be smelted in a furnace to make iron bars. Results in iron and sulphur dust when crushed.

items.name: Chalcopyrite
items.description: A mixture of iron and copper.
items.usageDescription: Can be smelted in a furnace to make copper bars. When crushed will result in copper and iron dust.

items.name: Malachite
items.description: A mineral containing mostly copper. The most common form in which copper is found.
items.usageDescription: Can be smelted into copper using a furnace. Crushing results in malachite dust which can be processed further into copper and water.

items.name: Cuprite
items.description: One of the purest forms of copper, aligned as an amorphous crystal.
items.usageDescription: Cannot be smelted using a regular furnace. Processing is only possible by crushing or by blast furnace. Due to it being a crystal, it can directly be sold.

items.name: Coal
items.description: A black, slightly glossy sedimentary rock that contains a lot of energy.
items.usageDescription: Can be used to power a boiler or to produce steel in a blast furnace.

items.name: Ruby
items.description: A red crystal containing mostly aluminium and chrome.
items.usageDescription: Can be crushed, which yields aluminium and chromium dust.

items.name: Iron Dust
items.usageDescription: Can be processed in a blast furnace to make iron bars.

items.name: Copper dust
items.description: A slightly green, slightly teal dust.
items.usageDescription: Can be processed in a blast furnace to make copper bars.

items.name: Zinc dust
items.usageDescription: Can be processed in a blast furnace to make zinc bars.
